# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/d3-color`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for D3JS d3-color module (https://github.com/d3/d3-color/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/d3-color

Additional Details
 * Last updated: Tue, 24 Apr 2018 23:15:31 GMT
 * Dependencies: none
 * Global values: none
